name: Orderly Objects
description:
Order in the hall of objects is required!
Provide this luxury in an expedient manner.
Haste yields the highest of scores.

Controls

Mostly mouse.
Tutorial included.

Esc: Go back to menu
R: Restart level
F: Toggle fullscreen

Misc

Took about 16 hours to put this together.
No music this time.

Originally made for Alakajam 9
